topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54125ce76368724b7f980000#post_54125ce76368724b7f980000
Motorhead: They make things accelerate and decelerate at will, even changing the direction. Even static objects can move. But, anything that's as big as a car will not be affected by it. It also has a short range.

Trivium: A stand that can split three knight-like figures work in perfect synchronization and only one is the real thing, but it has rather lackluster defence. It makes up for it with it's great attack and range.

FFDP: It only has one arm with a fingerless hand. The fingers grow over time and when there's five of them, instant death is ensured if the punch is landed on the stand or user. It also can tank well but it takes about 25 minutes to get to full strength.
